description: Do you need to subcontract work to other companies? If so, you need to build a vendor network. This course explains everything you need to know to work with vendors: Building relationships, where and how to recruit vendors, everything you need to know to maximize your revenue including fee setting considerations (memberships, referrals, commissions), the fundamentals of a vendor contract, overcoming objections, managing a vendor network and insuring your vendors both provide quality services and also put a great face on your company. In under two hours, you will learn everything you need to know to establish and manage a proper vendor network.
title: Vendor Networks- Creating Opportunities and Profits
